common.title: Mortgage Calculator
common.description: Calculator of state mortgage housing program

calculator.title: Mortgage Calculator
calculator.description: Calculate mortgage terms under the «єОселя» program
calculator.subtitle: Change parameters — results update automatically

family.ageHint: If you are under 26, down payment can be 10% instead of 20%

property.settlementTypeMajor: Kyiv, Dnipro, Lviv, Odesa, Kharkiv or regional center >300k
property.settlementTypeHint: This affects limit price coefficient (2.0 or 1.75)
property.buildingAgeHint: For most categories - up to 3 years, for IDP - up to 10 years

calculator.calculationError: Failed to calculate. Check your connection and try again.

results.title: Calculation Results
results.monthlyPaymentAfter10: New payment after 10 years (rate {rate}%, on remaining balance)
results.paymentHint: The payment for the first 10 years is calculated over the full loan term. After 10 years, the rate changes and the payment is recalculated.
results.totalForFullTerm: For the full loan term ({years} yrs)
results.comparisonDescription: Compare payments at different interest rates and down payment options

diagnosis.buildingAgeFail: Building is {actual} years, allowed up to {max}
diagnosis.buildingAgeAction1: Choose a building up to {max} years old
diagnosis.areaFail: Area {actual} m² exceeds norm {norm} m² by {percent}%
diagnosis.priceFail: Price {actual} UAH/m² exceeds limit {limit} UAH/m² by {percent}%
diagnosis.priceWarn: Price excess {percent}% → +{amount} UAH to down payment
diagnosis.areaWarn: Area excess {percent}% → +{amount} UAH to down payment

errors.buildingAgeExceeded: Building age exceeds limit for your category
errors.buildingAgeExceededDetail: Maximum building age for your category: {maxAge} years. Your building age: {actualAge} years. Choose a newer property or check your category.
errors.areaExceededDetail: Normative area for your family: {normArea} m². Your area: {actualArea} m². Excess: {excessArea} m² ({excessPercent}%). Maximum allowed excess: {maxPercent}%. Choose smaller housing or increase family size.
errors.areaExceededOldBuilding: Housing older than 3 years cannot exceed normative area
errors.areaExceededOldBuildingDetail: Normative area: {normArea} m². Your area: {actualArea} m² (excess {excessArea} m²). For housing older than 3 years, exceeding normative area is not allowed. Choose smaller housing or a new building (up to 3 years).
errors.priceExceededDetail: Limit price per m²: {limitPrice} UAH. Your price: {actualPrice} UAH/m². Excess: {excessPercent}%. Maximum allowed: {maxPercent}%. Find housing at a lower price.
errors.loanTooSmallDetail: Minimum loan amount: 200,000 UAH. Your amount after down payment deduction is too small. Reduce the down payment or choose more expensive housing.
errors.loanTooLargeDetail: Maximum loan amount: 5,000,000 UAH. Increase the down payment or choose cheaper housing.
errors.missingFields: All required fields must be filled

hero.title: State Mortgage Program "єОселя"
hero.subtitle: Affordable housing for Ukrainians at low interest - from 3% per annum

feature1.title: Low Interest Rate
feature1.description: Rate from 3% per annum for preferential categories

feature2.title: Long Term
feature2.description: Loan up to 20 years with comfortable repayment conditions

feature3.title: Easy Application
feature3.description: Submit application via "Diia" app in 10 minutes

step1.title: Check Your Category
step1.description: Find out if you belong to a preferential category and what rate is available to you

step2.title: Calculate Terms
step2.description: Use the calculator to calculate monthly payment and down payment

step3.title: Submit Application
step3.description: Submit application via "Diia" app and get bank decision
